Article.ArticleTitle: Multidisciplinary care in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: a 4-year longitudinal observational study.

Abstract.AbstractText: Over a four-year period, ALS patients complied with the modalities of the multidisciplinary management follow-up without any drop-outs. The multidisciplinary management structure also contributes to increasing the experience and knowledge of the clinicians involved in managing patients suffering from this rare disease.
